text: Renzo Ostino (7 May 1936 - 19 April 2020) was an Italian rower. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome with the men's coxed pair where they came fifth. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Turin Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Renzo Ostino
